title: Don’t Miss IntelliJ IDEA Conf 2025!
description: You’re invited to IntelliJ IDEA Conf 2025, a celebration of the developer community and a chance to connect with professionals who strive for excellence in software development. Join us online on June 3–4 for a free conference filled with insightful talks, hands-on sessions, and opportunities to learn from industry leaders and experts. Conference Details and […]
author: Anna Rovinskaia
excerpt: Join us online on June 3–4 for a free virtual IntelliJ IDEA Conf 2025.
text: Community Events IntelliJ IDEA Java Kotlin LiveStream NewsDon’t Miss IntelliJ IDEA Conf 2025! You’re invited to IntelliJ IDEA Conf 2025, a celebration of the developer community and a chance to connect with professionals who strive for excellence in software development. Join us online on June 3–4 for a free conference filled with insightful talks, hands-on sessions, and opportunities to learn from industry leaders and experts. Conference Details and Registration What to expect This year’s conference will feature a diverse lineup of sessions covering the latest trends and best practices in software development. Whether you’re an experienced developer or just starting out, you’ll gain insights that will help you write high-quality code faster, boost your productivity, and keep you up to date with cutting-edge technology support. The agenda covers a wide range of topics, from core Java and Kotlin development to AI integration, Spring Boot, Gradle, Kafka, and database management. You’ll also hear about cloud integration, secure coding practices, developer performance enhancements, and advanced development techniques. Stay tuned for the full schedule and complete list of speakers! Why this online event is special IntelliJ IDEA Conf 2025 is designed to be accessible from anywhere in the world! You can join from the comfort of your home or office and easily catch up on any sessions you miss by watching the recordings afterward. Whether you want to tune in live or watch at your own pace, we’ve got you covered. You’ll also have the opportunity to engage with other attendees through the chat. And, of course, there will be live Q&A sessions with our speakers where you can ask your burning questions and get answers directly from the experts. How to join The first step is to sign up for the event! When you register to participate, you can specify whether you want to attend all the sessions or only particular ones. Once your registration is complete, we’ll email you all the necessary details. Each session is scheduled to last for one hour. None of the sessions at this conference will be prerecorded. They will all be presented live, and the speakers will dedicate time to answering questions. We encourage you to ask any questions you might have via the live chat. Engaging with the speakers and your fellow participants is one of the best ways to learn. All sessions will be recorded and made available for you to watch again or catch up on after the event. Don’t forget to subscribe to IntelliJ IDEA’s YouTube channel to view them. Community partnerships Are you part of a developer community or user group? We’d love to partner with you!  Community partnerships provide a great opportunity to engage your members with exclusive content and showcase your community at the event. Find out more and see how you can get involved. We can’t wait to see you there! Sign Up for Free Now Subscribe to IntelliJ IDEA Blog updates
html:
Community Events IntelliJ IDEA Java Kotlin LiveStream News

Don’t Miss IntelliJ IDEA Conf 2025!

You’re invited to IntelliJ IDEA Conf 2025, a celebration of the developer community and a chance to connect with professionals who strive for excellence in software development.

Join us online on June 3–4 for a free conference filled with insightful talks, hands-on sessions, and opportunities to learn from industry leaders and experts.

Conference Details and Registration

What to expect

This year’s conference will feature a diverse lineup of sessions covering the latest trends and best practices in software development. Whether you’re an experienced developer or just starting out, you’ll gain insights that will help you write high-quality code faster, boost your productivity, and keep you up to date with cutting-edge technology support.

The agenda covers a wide range of topics, from core Java and Kotlin development to AI integration, Spring Boot, Gradle, Kafka, and database management. You’ll also hear about cloud integration, secure coding practices, developer performance enhancements, and advanced development techniques.

Stay tuned for the full schedule and complete list of speakers!

Why this online event is special

IntelliJ IDEA Conf 2025 is designed to be accessible from anywhere in the world! You can join from the comfort of your home or office and easily catch up on any sessions you miss by watching the recordings afterward. Whether you want to tune in live or watch at your own pace, we’ve got you covered.

You’ll also have the opportunity to engage with other attendees through the chat. And, of course, there will be live Q&A sessions with our speakers where you can ask your burning questions and get answers directly from the experts.

How to join

The first step is to sign up for the event!

When you register to participate, you can specify whether you want to attend all the sessions or only particular ones. Once your registration is complete, we’ll email you all the necessary details. Each session is scheduled to last for one hour.

None of the sessions at this conference will be prerecorded. They will all be presented live, and the speakers will dedicate time to answering questions. We encourage you to ask any questions you might have via the live chat. Engaging with the speakers and your fellow participants is one of the best ways to learn.

All sessions will be recorded and made available for you to watch again or catch up on after the event. Don’t forget to subscribe to IntelliJ IDEA’s YouTube channel to view them.

Community partnerships

Are you part of a developer community or user group? We’d love to partner with you! 

Community partnerships provide a great opportunity to engage your members with exclusive content and showcase your community at the event. Find out more and see how you can get involved.

We can’t wait to see you there!

Sign Up for Free Now

Subscribe to IntelliJ IDEA Blog updates
